tech_news.title: Your Google Play Points might be hiding a secret $200 Pixel 10 Pro discount - Android Authority
tech_news.description: Some Google Play Points users have discovered a secret $200 discount offer on the Pixel 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL hiding in the Perks section.

Xbox architect hints at an exciting 2026 for Xbox - Windows Central

tech_news.title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2 Remake Plans Revealed as KOTOR 1 Reimagining Continues Development at Saber - IGN
tech_news.description: Saber Interactive’s troubled Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic remake is reportedly still in development – and a KOTOR 2 remake may be on the way, too.

tech_news.title: Ditching Spotify Has Been A Bleak Experience To Say The Least - aftermath.site
Google’s AI try-on app Doppl adds a shoppable discovery feed - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The tech giant says the idea behind the new feed is to display recommendations so users can discover and virtually try on items. Nearly everything in the feed is shoppable, with direct links to merchants.
